description:

It is hard to hide myself and camera on the floor while the other two cameras roll, and of course the timing of their cumshots was not in sync. We did have to wait for both guys to ramp up for the final, and well, you can tell!
But if you like cum on an asshole and dripping down onto you as if "you are there" you can forgive the timing. Santana even tries to shove his cum covered cock back in but just gets to wobbly.
So for this one, pretend you are laying on your back watching these two guys fuck on top of you!
title: Santana & Silas - RAW
